meanings.definition: The act of emblazoning or adorning with a design or symbol.
meanings.sent1: The emblazonment of the shield with a lion showed bravery.
meanings.sent2: The knight's emblazonment of his coat of arms was intricate and colorful.
meanings.sent3: The emblazonment of the flag with a smiley face brought unexpected joy.
meanings.sent4: Her emblazonment of the room with fairy lights created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The emblazonment of the cake with edible flowers made it look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: A design or symbol that is prominently displayed or depicted.
meanings.sent1: The royal emblazonment on the banner caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The company logo was the emblazonment on all their products.
meanings.sent3: The emblazonment of the tree with colorful ribbons made it stand out in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His emblazonment of the car with racing stripes gave it a sporty look.
meanings.sent5: The emblazonment of the building with golden letters made it look prestigious.
